steps.title: Forward to your Workpal
steps.body: Don't break your flow. Just forward any email, thread, or attachment to your private workpal.email address. No tabs, no copy-pasting.

steps.title: Workpal figures out the task
steps.body: It reads the context to determine what's needed — a polite decline, a deal summary, data extraction, or a draft reply. No prompting required.

steps.title: You get the result (privately)
steps.body: Workpal emails you back. You review it, tweak if needed, then forward it yourself. You are always in control of what leaves your inbox.

items.question: Will Workpal email my clients or boss?
items.answer: Never. Workpal is a closed loop. It is hard-coded to reply only to your registered email address. It cannot initiate or send emails to anyone else. You always decide what gets forwarded out.

items.question: Do I need to write prompts?
items.answer: No. Workpal reads the email thread you forward to determine the task. Forward a contract — it summarizes it. Forward a client question — it drafts a reply. If it's unsure, it emails you a clarifying question.

items.question: How does it know my writing style?
items.answer: It uses professional formatting by default. You can optionally connect your LinkedIn, upload a resume, or describe your role so Workpal matches your seniority, industry vocabulary, and tone.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. All emails are encrypted with enterprise-grade TLS in transit. Your data is used solely to generate your response and is never used to train public AI models.

items.question: What if Workpal misunderstands the task?
items.answer: That's the beauty of the closed loop. The result comes back to you, not your client. Review it, edit it, or reply to Workpal with a quick correction and it'll redo it. Zero risk of an AI draft reaching the wrong person.
items.note: NEW — not in original spec. Addresses the skeptic's #1 fear and turns closed loop into a safety net.
